SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BOARD WHERE 1=1
AND DATE_FORMAT(REG_DTTM, '%Y-%m-%d') >= DATE_FORMAT(#{srchRegDateStart}, '%Y-%m-%d')
AND DATE_FORMAT(REG_DTTM, '%Y-%m-%d') <= DATE_FORMAT(#{srchRegDateEnd}, '%Y-%m-%d')
AND CATEGORY_ID = #{srchCategory}
AND CONCAT(IFNULL(USER_NAME, ''), IFNULL(TITLE, ''), IFNULL(CONTENTS, '')) LIKE CONCAT('%', TRIM(#{srchWord}), '%')

SELECT ID, CATEGORY_ID, (SELECT NAME FROM CATEGORY WHERE ID = CATEGORY_ID) AS CATEGORY_NAME, USER_NAME, PASSWORD, TITLE, CONTENTS, VIEWS, FILE_1, FILE_2, FILE_3, REG_DTTM, MOD_DTTM FROM BOARD WHERE ID = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOARD ( ID, CATEGORY_ID, USER_NAME, PASSWORD, TITLE, CONTENTS, VIEWS, FILE_1, FILE_2, FILE_3, REG_DTTM, MOD_DTTM ) VALUES ( NULL, #{categoryId}, #{userName}, #{password}, #{title}, #{contents}, 0, #{file1}, #{file2}, #{file3}, NOW(), NULL )
mapper.update: UPDATE BOARD SET CATEGORY_ID = #{categoryId}, PASSWORD = #{password}, TITLE = #{title}, CONTENTS = #{contents}, FILE_1 = #{file1}, FILE_2 = #{file2}, FILE_3 = #{file3}, MOD_DTTM = NOW() WHERE ID = #{id}
UPDATE BOARD SET VIEWS = #{views} + 1 WHERE ID = #{id}
